Findmypast | Software Engineers - React, Node & Elixir | London OR Dundee - Onsite |

Findmypast​ ​is​ ​the​ ​technology​ ​company​ ​behind​ ​the​ ​online​ ​genealogy​ ​brand​ ​Findmypast​ ​and the​ ​social​ ​history​ ​brand​ ​The​ ​British​ ​Newspaper​ ​Archive. We have millions of registered users and billions of records.

We’re​ ​building​ ​a​ ​new​ ​customer​ ​experience​ ​underpinned​ ​by React.js​ ​while​ ​building​ ​out​ ​a​ ​platform​ ​of​ ​microservices​ ​with​ ​Elixir​ ​and​ ​Node.js.​ Our​ ​core​ ​programming​ ​languages​ ​are​ ​modern​ ​JavaScript​ ​and​ ​Elixir. A​ ​good​ ​portion​ ​of our​ ​existing​ ​platform​ ​is written in​ ​C#.​
